name: Lucky Wheel - Spinning Wheel
description:
Lucky Wheel is a wheel of fortune game. It is easy to play by only tap tap and tap on screen with one finger. Your job is attaching small ball to spinning wheel as much as possible. Lucky Wheel game have a huge number of levels for player. The wheel spin automatically and always change speed and spinning direction over each level. Take a look into wheel speed and tap your finger at the right time so that balls get slots in spinning wheel and no attach to other balls.

Lucky Wheel game feature:
- Have a huge number of level (700)
- Have a leaderboard for player ranking
- Try wheel of fortune game within music on background

How to play Lucky Wheel game:
So simple, just tap screen to attach number balls to the spinning wheel as much as possible so that they are not touch together.

Try your best and enjoy it!
